string-array.name: wait_messages
string-array.item: Hmm. Looks like you are\na bit too late!
Play along next game!\nYou will be notified!
Unlucky in the game,\nlucky in love...
We know you want to play!\nJoin again next game!
A new item will be\ndropped every 0.5 - 2 hours!
Better go for a walk and\nscout for items you expect!
Game has already started :(\nStay tuned though!
Keep up your ranking\nby Snapping quicker then\n others!
Did you know your ranking is\ndetermined by your last\nscores?
